alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Hill; Johnson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Johnson, northwestern Hill and western Ellis Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Alvarado to Bardwell, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Cleburne, Ennis, Midlothian, Keene, Joshua, Alvarado, Venus, Italy, Grandview, Maypearl, Bardwell, Covington, Rio Vista and Garrett. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 9 and 30. Interstate 35E between mile markers 384 and 404. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
